triples.name: Time series
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the fundamental problem of analyzing multivariate time-series data with sequential temporal properties.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: GNN-based methods are the foundation upon which FC-STGNN is built to capture spatial-temporal dependencies.

triples.name: Convolutional neural network
triples.relevance: Graph convolution operations used in the FC graph convolution component are based on convolutional principles.

triples.name: Graph theory
triples.relevance: Graph theory provides the mathematical foundation for modeling spatial-temporal dependencies as a fully-connected graph structure.

triples.name: Neural network architecture
triples.relevance: The paper proposes FC-STGNN, a novel neural network architecture that uniquely combines spatial-temporal graph construction with graph convolution for multivariate time-series modeling.
